divs: Sighting Detailslook i don't have a ton of time but my wife was out shooting chemtrails? laTER she looks at the pics and notices two white dots....she zoomed in on them and you can see the lights and the vague shape but i would bet the farm this is the same craft....it is her second encounter I saw one with her in san diego 6 years ago over the bay but it was a classic "belgium triangle see "toppersbazaar.com under "ufo" for description of that event......anyhow the picture I'm sending you is a little blown up maybe 20 % in the original it's just two dots she could not see when shooting the picture...this is it baby.....zoom in ...let me know how you like it....the whole point is it's exactly the same craft that's on coast to coasts web site front page today "cigar shape in Nevada" please write back
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
